description:
Experience ultimate comfort with the Aspire Quilted Slim Leg Pant, a fusion of cozy quilted warmth and breathable luxury. These lounge/lifestyle bottoms are designed for relaxation, offering a snug fit with rib detailing at the waistband and side slits for extra comfort.

  • Cozy quilted warmth meets breathable luxury
  • Rib detailing at the waistband for a snug fit
  • Side slits enhance comfort and flexibility
  • Multiple pockets for convenient storage
  • Semi-fitted style that strikes the perfect balance between comfort and functionality
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
name: MPG Aspire Quilted Slim Leg Pants - Women's
